description:
Easy Quality Assurance and Terminology

ApSIC Xbench provides simple and powerful Quality Assurance and Terminology Management in a single package. Just load files in any of the dozens of CAT formats supported and get your translation quality to the next level.
- Added support for new Google Polyglot format
- Added support for memoQ 11.1, 11.2, and 11.3
- Added support for CSV files in Tab-delimited files
- Added suport for Excel files downloaded from Excel Online
- Increased font size selections
- Fixed issue with .sldxliff files with track changes
